CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 3, 1945, pg. 16 reads: "Surprise Party - A buffet dinner and surprise birthday party, honoring Mrs. Vivian Scott Gibson, were given at the home of her mother, Mrs. F.T. Scott, of Hallett Street, recently. The party was given by her sister, Mrs. Helen Long, and brother, James Scott. The forty-two guests included visitors from West Virginia, New York, and Beaver Falls, Pa. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men and women, including Vivian Scott Gibson wearing corsage, gathered for her birthday party in home of Mrs. F. T. Scott, Hallett Street
